bcl:section.bcl:text: A person is not eligible to be or to remain a member of the board if the person is

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: an employee of the university, and
a voting member of the executive body of, or an officer of, an academic or non-academic staff association of the university who has the responsibility, or joint responsibility with others, to

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: negotiate with the board, on behalf of the academic or non-academic staff association of the university, the terms and conditions of service of members of that association, or
adjudicate disputes regarding members of the academic or non-academic staff association of the university.
